metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7400 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
OpenStack Horizon 9.x through 9.1.1, 10.x through 10.0.2, and 11.0.0 allows remote authenticated administrators to conduct XSS attacks via a crafted federation mapping.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7400` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

openstack-dashboard - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
openstack-dashboard-ubuntu-theme - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
python-django-horizon - 2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: horizon package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:9.1.2-0ubuntu1').
